msg.description: Any English sentence, meant as information for developers and implementers. Avoid displaying this to the users and especially do not expect those messages to stay stable.

msg_localised.description: Optional localized message that can be displayed to the user if existing. The language can be set by in the request or will fallback to English.

id.description: The request uuid that can be used to identify and trace API calls.

host.description: Server host and protocol from which request was handled.

count.description: the length of the results array.

results.description: The envelope of items, that are usually objects. We are generally sending back arrays even if there was just one requested resource.

created_at.description: The date and time entity was created

updated_at.description: The date and time entity was updated

name.description: Name of the branch, warehouse or warehouse shelf
